price: Ese abahakanyi banyu (b’i Maka) ni bo beza kurusha abo (abantu ba Adi, aba Thamudi, aba Nuhu n’aba Farawo, boretswe)? Cyangwa mufite ubudahangarwa bwanditse mu bitabo (bwo kutazahanwa)?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
